text:
Watertown, MA; full-time Technical Sales Engineer @SoftArtisans http://www.softartisans.com/jobs-technical-sales-engineer About us: -We are a close-knit and agile team. -We work hard: crafting beautiful code while solving challenging problems for enterprise. Looking for someone that has at least 1 to 2 years programming with a server-side web development technology.

Interested? Send me a note paulam@softartisans.com
